titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the cost of labor for building envelope improvements to be included for purposes of the nonbusiness energy property tax credit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 12/3/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax credit for nonbusiness energy property expenditures, to include labor costs paid to prepare, assemble, or install any residential energy efficiency improvements eligible for such credit.
